item.title: Imperial Wolverines Women make history at inaugural fixture
item.author: Leo Haigh,
item.description: On Sunday, Imperial Wolverines made history at the University South Open with several remarkable achievements. The newly formed Women’s 1st team made their inaugural appearance at a competitive fixture, the Men’s 1st team accomplished 2nd place amongst fierce competition and, for the first time, …

item.title: Dodge, duck, dip, dive, dodge
item.author: Leo Haigh,
item.description: Dodgeball is a fast paced, new and exciting sport. The concept is very simple, there are two teams competing and the aim of the game is to get everyone out by either hitting them with the ball or catching their throws. Imperial Dodgeball is a fun and social club for people of all abilities, ranging …
